title: Wow! This 1 bed, 726 sq ft townhome is simply stunning! Visit today!
posting_body: ['Stonetree Apartments', 'Leasing Office:', '2414 Stone Rd', 'East Point, GA 30344', 'show contact info', 'Take a look at what Stonetree Apartments has to offer!', 'At Peak Living, we are committed to excellent service for our residents.', 'Our community has everything you are looking for in a new apartment home.', 'Our caring, on-site management and maintenance professionals are eager to meet all your needs.', 'Designed to give our residents the best, this is more than a place to call home-it is Apartment Living at its Peak!', 'Rental Information:', '1 Bedroom / 1 Bathroom / 726 sq ft / $982 - $1144/Month', 'Lease Terms:', 'Variable', 'Apartment Amenities:', '❖ Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '❖ Carpeted Floor', '❖ Ceiling Fans', '❖ Central Air Conditioning and Efficient Gas Heat', '❖ Dishwasher', '❖ Fully-Equipped Eat-In Family Kitchens/Pantry', '❖ Oven', '❖ Range', '❖ Tub/Shower', '❖ Vinyl Flooring', '❖ Designer Mini Blinds', '❖ Fireplace in Select 2 Bedroom Units Only', '❖ Formal Dining Room', '❖ Frost-Free Refrigerator', '❖ High Speed Internet Access', '❖ Linen Closets', '❖ Spacious Storage with Walk-In Closets', '❖ Sunrooms and Private Patios in Select Apartments', '❖ Trash Compactor', '❖ Wet Bar', 'Additional Information:', '❖ 24 Hour Availability', "❖ Children's Playground Area", '❖ Convenient Online Rental Payments', '❖ Laundry Facilities', '❖ Lush, Professionally Maintained Landscaping', '❖ On-Site Maintenance/Management', '❖ Package Service', '❖ Planned Social Activities', '❖ Resident Referral Program', '❖ Sparkling Swimming Pool', '❖ City of Decatur "Award-Winning" Dining Just Minutes Away', '❖ Complimentary Wi-Fi At The Business Center, Pool and Sundeck', '❖ Convenient to DeKalb Medical and Emory Hospitals/Medical Centers', '❖ Easy Access to I-285 (Atlanta Perimeter), I-20 & I-85', '❖ Minutes to Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport', '❖ Monthly Pest Control', '❖ Northlake Mall and North DeKalb Mall Shopping', '❖ On Marta Bus Line.', 'Kensington and Indian Creek Rail Stations Nearby', '❖ Stone Mountain Park Close By', '❖ Total Electric - Gardens and Townhomes', 'Leasing Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management Company:', 'Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '5FF04D1D126E430']
